resources.string: Search for officials by name or try searching by your City, State, or Zip Code.

In 2017, Kamala D. Harris was sworn in as a United States Senator for California, the second African-American woman and first South Asian-American senator in history. She serves on the Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs Committee, the Select Committee on Intelligence, the Committee on the Judiciary, and the Committee on the Budget.
Is Kamala Harris actively supporting Black and traditionally marginalized communities? Give us your rating. You may update anytime.

Is Kamala harris actively working to improve black and other marginalized communities in the following areas? your ratings will contribute to the allyscore
Thanks for rating Kamala Harris and contributing to their Ally Score. YOur Action helps hold ellected officials accountable to the people they present
Friendly Airport for Mothers Improvement Act

This bill requires small hub airports to maintain a lactation area for nrsing mothers and a baby changing table in at least one men\'s and one women\'s restroom in each passengers terminal building of the airport. Currently, medium and large hub airports most comply with this requirements by FY2021. The bill requires small hub airports to be in compliance by FY2023
Kamala voted YES on HB 123-45. Do you agree or disagree with that Vote?
The AllyScore Represents the elected level of support for Black and marginalized communities,
The Ally Score is calculated based on several data inputs including, but not limited to, voting history, legislation sponsorship, public remarks, and user ratings.
